translation: These I do not wish to kill, O Krishna, even though they kill me, for the sake of dominion over the three worlds; leave alone killing them for the sake of the earth."
commentary: 1.35 Ethan these? Not not? to kill to kill? I wish (I) wish? Even if they kill me? Madhusudana O Madhusudana (the slayer of Madhu? a demon)? Even even? dominion over the three worlds? Hetoá¸¥ for the sake of? Kim how? Nu then? Mahikrite for the sake of the earth.No Commentary.
